categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic platoons

nodes.text: A platoon of the Alliance to Restore the Republic was participated in the liberation of the Outer Rim mining colony of New Valis. The infantry platoon consisted of Rebel Marines, and was led by Captain Ette Shi'lou, who served with her troopers for several years. During the liberation, the platoon fought against a company of stormtroopers of the Galactic Empire, and were eventually victorious.
